title: Bug 13725: Revert is much slower than close and reopen in java editor
description: Bug 13725: Revert is much slower than close and reopen in the java editor.
OB: When I try to revert a file in the java editor, it takes significantly more time compared to closing the file and reopening it.
EB: This seems odd because reverting the file contents should not take longer than simply closing and reopening the file.
SR:
To reproduce this issue:
1. Open a Java file in the editor.
2. Make some changes to the file.
3. Click on the 'Revert' option.
4. Observe that it takes longer for the file to revert compared to closing and reopening the file.
